title: 3D Star Wars Lamp, ZNZ LED Optical Illusion Night Light, 16 Colors Changing Remote Touch Mood Lamp - Perfect Christmas and Birthday Gifts for Kids Men Women and Star Wars Fans
features: ❤3D CREATIVE DESIGN: This 3D visual creative night light is a perfect gift for kids and Star Wars Fans; Fashion innovative artistic atmosphere bedside light designed with a variety of 2D graphics, which offer 3D visual impact; Unique lighting effects and amazing optical visual illusion home decor lamp makes your room more interesting.
❤16 COLORS and 3 MODES: This 3D dimmable light lamp can be changed between 16 colors; you can choose different modes and colors depending on your mood or surrounding.

❤USB and BATTERY OPERATED (BATTERY DO NOT INCLUDE): Creative night light can be operated with USB and 3 x AA batteries, which is very convenient for you to use it; USB cable of this table light can plug in laptop, desktop, portable power bank, USB charger adapter.
❤3D Star Wars Night Light: Laser Engraving Acrylic Panels Can Give You a Perfect Sense of 3D Vision Like it is Floating.

❤PERFECT GIFT: This 3D creative Lamp is an ideal gift for babies, toddlers, children, teenagers, adults, friends, boyfriends, girlfriends, loves, and family. It can be used as birthday, Father's Day Mother's Day, Thanksgiving gifts, Nice decoration for bedroom, child room, living room, bar, shop, cafe, restaurant, office, wedding, parties and restaurant atmosphere, study, living room, bar, shops, etc decorative
description: Product Description The 3D LED Illusion Lamp is a combination of art and technology that creates an optical 3D illusion and plays tricks on eyes. When you see from afar, you will see the design, but when get closer, it appears a thin acrylic plat sheet. It's an amazing design to delight the guest and light up the room of your lives. This playful product combines hand-made fibers with natural materials and produced by machines and artisan. Good choice for delight the office, living room, bedroom, as a night lamp or any way you want to show. 3D vision effect, especially in the dark or take a photo, the visual thrill will be strong! PMMA acrylic material,Not a glass, the whole board is a solid acrylic. Strong, hard, high toughness, not fragile, aviod hurting to child. Low heat-conductive function keeps working longer time But no Hot feeling, Soft warm light can keep safe for eyes. 16 Color change Get the exact color by touching the smart switch one by one. Touch button Press one time, one color light up, press again, another color light up. Automatically color changing mode - Press the touch button to last color, then press it again, auto color changing mode works. How to shut down - Long touch the smart sensor switch to TURN OFF. Remote Control Both the touch button & remote control can power on/off, 16 multicolor change, 7 colors select, 4 flash modes choose. Note: Please pull off the plastic card of the remote control when first use, or it does not work. Great present for Christmas, Father's Day, Mother's Day，Birthday, advertising promotion, holiday, tourist attractions. Make a nice decoration atmosphere for bedroom, child room, living room, bar, shop, cafe, restaurant, office, wedding, parties etc. Package Included 3 *Acrylic Plate 1 *ABS Base 1 *Remote Control 1 *USB Cable 1 *User Manual Tips --Do hold the edge of the light plate when you use it at any time in avoid leaving a fingerprint on it. --Keep grease, water, or other liquid away from the lamp. --Do not put the lamp near the fire and throw it into the fire. --Do not put the lamp in conditions above 60℃ temperature. --The best remote control distance for the remote control is 10 feet (5 M). --Please replace the button battery inside the remote control if it runs out. --Do not put the moon lamp under close to the high-temperature object. --3D just visual effect, the lamp itself is flat.
